channel.title: Golang on 𝐷𝑒𝑣ℝ𝑥.𝑖𝑜
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on 𝐷𝑒𝑣ℝ𝑥.𝑖𝑜

item.title: Query JSON data using Golang (gojsonq package)
item.description: Learn how to query JSON data effortlessly in Go using the gojsonq package. This guide demonstrates powerful techniques to parse and extract JSON data with simplicity and efficiency.

item.title: Let’s make a simple todo app with Go
item.description: Build a simple Todo app with Go! This guide walks you through creating a basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application using Go, where you’ll manage a list of tasks with a simple API and store data in database.

item.title: An easy way to validate Go request
item.description: Learn simple and efficient methods to validate HTTP requests in Go. Explore best practices and tools to ensure clean and reliable input handling in your applications.

item.title: Build RESTful API service in golang using gin-gonic framework
item.description: Learn how to build a REST API service in Go using the Gin-Gonic framework. This guide covers setting up routes, handling requests with easy-to-understand examples.
